name: 2013 Vanilla Team SS Jersey
description:
Despite using modern materials and construction for the new Vanilla Team kit, we wanted to retain the purity of the good old days; the forging things with your hands days. The colors are vivid and true to Vanilla's palette and the design is minimal and balanced, an aesthetic shared with our bikes, too. 

Our stainless Vanilla headbadge zipper pull infuses this garment with the specialness that you expect from our workshop.

We're working with Castelli to produce the Vanilla kit for us because they're making most everything not just in the US, but right here in the northwest. That's important to us. They have also been a great supporter of our race team; we see eye to eye on the importance of the soul of a team. And lastly, because the quality and feel of their clothing is killer.

Specifications:

- Procool PlusTM fabric for breathability and comfort 
- Full zip
- Three rear pockets
- USA Made

Runs Small - Consult Sizing Chart for Best Fit

name: 2013 Vanilla Team Bibs
description:
The Vanilla Team bibs simple, block design looks great with both the cream and navy jerseys. So now you don't have to decide which color you like best, get both. 

We're working with Castelli to produce the Vanilla kit for us because they're making most everything not just in the US, but right here in the northwest. That's important to us. They have also been a great supporter of our race team; we see eye to eye on the importance of the soul of a team. And lastly, because the quality and feel of their clothing is killer.

Specifications:

- Micro-mesh upper for breathability 
- Kiss3 Seat Pad for all-day comfort
- USA Made

Runs Small - Consult Sizing Chart for Best Fit

name: 2013 Vanilla Team Arm Warmers
description:
Vanilla flowers explode up your arms. Made with Lycra they're perfect for cool summer mornings adding a blast of color when worn with the Team vest. 

We're working with Castelli to produce the Vanilla kit for us because they're making most everything not just in the US, but right here in the northwest. That's important to us. They have also been a great supporter of our race team; we see eye to eye on the importance of the soul of a team. And lastly, because the quality and feel of their clothing is killer.

Specifications:

- Classic gel gripper with soft stretch to hold warmer in place
- Light weight Lycra material
- USA Made

*Buy your jersey size

name: 2013 Vanilla Team Vest
description:
The Vanilla Team vest is made to complement the rest of the Vanilla kit, but also understated enough that you can mix and match with anything.

We're offering the Vanilla vest in a thin and stow-able Windshell fabric and also a colder weather Thermal material. The wind vest features side zips for easy access to jersey pockets while the thermal vest has a higher collar and three back pockets for stowing your phone, a PB & J and arm warmers. Choose one, or both in the drop down window below. 

We're working with Castelli to produce the Vanilla kit for us because they're making most everything not just in the US, but right here in the northwest. That's important to us. They have also been a great supporter of our race team; we see eye to eye on the importance of the soul of a team. And lastly, because the quality and feel of their clothing is killer.

Specifications for Windshell vest:

- Windshear fabric provides lightweight wind and rain protection
- Two zipper side openings for jersey pocket access 
- Packable construction
- Full zip
- USA Made

Specifications for Thermal Vest: (Available Dec. 30th)

- Windproof and water resistant
- High collar trimmed with Thermoflex for comfort
- Mesh-lined back with vent at pocket for breathability
- Fleeced interior 3 back pockets
- Full zip
- USA Made

Runs Small - Consult Sizing Chart for Best Fit

name: 2013 Vanilla Team LS Jersey
description:
The long sleeve Vanilla Team jersey is perfect for the fall or those high mountain training sessions with a soft, fleece inside. The solid sleeves look really great with the bibs making a great cross kit too. 

We're working with Castelli to produce the Vanilla kit for us because they're making most everything not just in the US, but right here in the northwest. That's important to us. They have also been a great supporter of our race team; we see eye to eye on the importance of the soul of a team. And lastly, because the quality and feel of their clothing is killer.

Specifications:

- Warmer fabric with fleece interior 
- Three rear pockets
- Full Zip 
- USA Made

Runs Small - Consult Sizing Chart for Best Fit

name: Speedvagen Family Racing Cap
description:
***Available January 2014***

Made for us by Rothera Cycling in Austin, TX the Speedvagen Family Racing caps feature the SPEEDVAGEN racing stripes down the center of the cap with grey shields on either side using a custom sublimation process that looks tech but wears classic. 

The body is 100% organic cotton and the brim is Dri-Fit. 

The inside of the cap is finished properly with a thick 1-inch elasticated sweat band to keep the hat securely on your head and keep the sweat out of your eyes on those hard efforts. 

Machine wash in cold water, hang dry. 

One size fits most. 

Fits comfortably under a helmet.

name: Speedvagen CX Team Merino Socks
description:
These babies are some great race day woolies and the perfect compliment to our Pit Boots with our new wool felt insoles. 

Four sizes available to make sure you get the perfect fit.
Small (M 4.5-8.5, W 6-8)
Medium (M 7-9, W 8.5-10.5)
Large (M 9.5-11.5, W 11-13)
XLarge (M 12+ )


Made in the USA.

name: Speedvagen Team Water Bottles
description:
Our new water bottles, in team colors, feature the Specialized Purist technology and MoFlo cap. 

Purist bottles are said to be "As pure as drinking from a glass—with all the advantages of a flexible bottle." 

I was skeptical until I used one. The test, leaving a half full bottle in the garage overnight and taking a big drink the next morning. No plastic or funky taste at all, I was sold! We hope you like them too. 

The MoFlo cap is bigger which took a minute to get used to. I like that you can remove the nozzle for better cleaning too. 

Sold as a pair. 

Made in California. 

Get wet!

name: Speedvagen Shield Tee
description:
Printed on super soft American Apparel 50/25/25 Track tees. The shirt is Tri-Coffee (a heather grey/brown) with a light blue on white shield. The perfect summer tee. 

Specifics:
- 50% Polyester/25% Cotton/ 25% Rayon
- Made in the USA

name: The Pit Boot
description:
So we've been dreaming of a rubber boot that would help us skate that delicate line between the practical (wanting to have dry cozy feet)  and indulgence (looking good). We wanted a boot that would both nurture our sensitive side, while maintaining that hard-man exterior that a crew needs to wear in the pits of the pro racing circuits. 
Our dream boots were in development for about a year and we are beyond stoked to offer them to you for hard working good times. The Speedvagen Pit Boot!

Specifications:

-US made 
-Soft semi-insulated interior
-Dual density Sole; the black being ideal for rugged terrain and the red gripping on smooth slippery surfaces (think port-a-potty floor)
-B.O.A. (Bureau of Awesome!) Rating of 11

*** PLEASE NOTE: OUR BOOTS RUN LARGE BY 1/2 SIZE. IF YOU ARE RUNNING A VERY THICK WOOL SOCK, YOU SHOULD BE GOOD WITH YOUR STANDARD SIZE. OTHERWISE, WE SUGGEST YOU GET A SIZE SMALLER***

name: Speedvagen Felted Wool Boot Insoles
description:
We spent a year developing the Speedvagen Pit Boot and we honestly didn't think we could improve on it. Thankfully, we were wrong.

Wool, as you know, is an amazing insulator and these puppies keep your piggies much warmer and drier than a regular insole. The 6mm wool felt adds some cushion too, making your day in the pits 200% better! 

*Since our boots typically run a 1/2 size big, the addition of this insole brings them back to a standard size. 

** These run a full size big for street shoes/boots. Order one size smaller than your normal shoe size. **

name: Speedvagen Integrated Cross Stem
description:
This is the first time that a Speedvagen component is being offered separate from the frameset and we’re so excited to release something that we feel brings real value to all cross racers. In collaboration with ENVE, we’ve designed and built a carbon stem with integrated front brake routing that replaces the hanger and the associated flex, weight, chatter and unsightly lines that come with it. 

We’ve been running this stem on our team bikes for years now and our experience is that it essentially eliminates front-end chatter while braking. The additional rider benefits that come with smoother cable routing, lighter braking action and 51g weight savings are in keeping with the Speedvagen mantra: “Take away everything that isn’t essential and refine what’s left.” 

Features:
●	Eliminates the weight of the cable hanger and 8” of additional housing for a combined weight savings of 51g
●	Significantly decreases cable flex and in turn adds power to braking
●	Offers the lowest possible stack height for shorter riders
●	The more direct braking line means less cable/housing friction 
●	Helps calm brake chatter
●	The gradual radius of the stainless internal routing offers less cable friction and lighter braking action

Specs:
Titanium hardware, cold forged alloy faceplate, molded-in threads and stainless internal routing. 
•	Weight: 133g (110mm)
•	Length: 90, 100, 110, 120mm
•	Rise: -6º
•	Clamp: 31.8
•	Stack: 41mm

name: Speedvagen Team Cap
description:
Our new Speedvagen team cap is a good fit. This army green team cap incorporates the color bands from our team jersey and bibs into the ribbon and features a tone-on-tone Speedvagen shield on either side. 

- 100% cotton
- Cotton twill tape band
- Made in USA
- 8-panel 'Euro' style
- Traditional bill

name: Speedvagen Socks
description:
Made for us by Sockguy and available in Sky Blue or Charcoal.

The sky blue Speedvagen sock is a slightly lighter weight and shorter cut, making it more suitable for  warm weather riding.

The charcoal colored Speedvagen sock is made of wool and is a little taller than the sky blue sock  making it the best option for cool weather.

 Specs:

- SM/M is suitable for size 5-9
- L/XL are suitable for size 9-13
- Charcoal socks are wool, Sky blue are an ultra wicking acrylic blend

name: Speedvagen Utility Sign
description:
We like to think back to a time when things were real, they were made by hand and made to last. The Speedvagen Utility Sign draws inspiration from the days when a company's signs and it's adverts were applied with a porcelain enamel to a heavy stamped sheet metal base. These are the kind of signs that you can find in an antique shop now, (70 years later) and they are still gorgeous.

Our Utility sign is laser cut by the same shop who does our dropouts, head badges and other special pieces. The color work is done in 5 stages by our paint shop in Speedvagen's signature army green, red and baby pink palette.

"Okay, it's cool and all, but what do I do with it" you ask? You hang it up somewhere (your workshop wall? bedroom ceiling?) and feel the magic. That's what you do with it. 

 Specs:

- Laser cut from 1/8" american made hot rolled steel plate
- 8" wide, 10.5" tall
- Mounting holes allow for a 1/4" bolt
- Exact color layout may vary

FREE SHIPPING ON DOMESTIC ORDERS OVER $100
enter code: DOMESTICSHIPPING

DISCOUNTED SHIPPING ON INTERNATIONAL ORDERS OVER $100
enter code: INTLSHIPPING

name: Red Speedvagen Cap
description:
A gorgeous, sligtly burnt red with sky blue Speedvagen shield on the front left panel.

The cut is that of a traditional euro race cap complete with a full cotton twill tape on the inside of the crown.

 Specs:

- Design by Jered Bogli and Sacha White
-Made in the US by Pace
-Traditional bill

name: Vanilla All Stars Print Series
description:
For a bunch of years now, I’ve been looking for an outlet (other than our website) for the beautiful images that Vanilla’s photographer Bob Huff has taken of our bikes. I didn’t just want to do straight prints of photos, but something more substantial. More special.

What we’ve done is chosen four of our very favorite bikes that are featured on our site; the ones that we love so much that we want to make thousands of them (the All Stars) and had the studio shots printed on large (10”x 20”) sheets of gorgeous, raw ¼” planks of northwest fir. We balanced the visual weight of the bicycle with hand painted pin striping in Vanilla’s signature sky blue as well as a stainless headbadge mounted with the same stainless hardware that we use to affix the headbadge to our frames.

The finished product, I think, conveys the quality of what we do. The fineness that we want everything that leaves our shop to possess.

There are limited numbers of each print, so if you like one, seize the day!

name: Vanilla Print- Series One
description:
This is a re-issue of the first in the series of Vanilla prints. Inspired by the hard lined and vivid watercolor work of Alphonse Mucha and other beautiful advertisements from the art nouveau era this print features Sacha's wife and daughter riding the blue stepthrough from the Vanilla site currently shown on the Vanilla "commuter" page.

Original art by Dan Gillsdorf of Atlas Tattoo. Offset and letterpress done here in southeast Portland by artisan printers Rebecca, Brian and Eric of Stumptown printers.

Specifications:

- Archival quality paper ensuring a long life

- Actual size: 15” x 23”

name: Delilah Sue Print
description:
The latest in a series of nouveau prints from the Vanilla Workshop. The Delilah Sue print is inspired by Sacha’s youngest daughter  and the award winning tricycle that he built for her in ‘06

Original art by Dan Gillsdorf of Atlas Tattoo. Spot color and letterpress done here in southeast Portland by artisan printers Rebecca, Brian and Eric of Stumptown printers.

Specifications:

 - Archival quality paper ensuring a long life

 - Each print is signed and numbered by both Dan and Sacha

 - Actual size: 15” x 23”

name: Speedvagen Tee
description:
Printed on American Apparel. 

Specifics:
- Made in the USA

BUY TWO GET ONE FREE! - add three t-shirts of any design to your cart and enter promo code: TSHIRTSALE

name: Circle V t-shirt
description:
Our stainless "V" Dropouts have become an icon of what Vanilla is about. Beauty, Function and Thoroughly developed design. 

This Tee captures the crispness and elegance of our drops with a fine line silk screen of the "Circle V" logo.

Specs:

- Blanks are American Apparel and US made
- Printed here in southeast Portland.
- Available in Light aqua with Army, or Army with Light Aqua

BUY TWO GET ONE FREE! - add three t-shirts of any design to your cart and enter promo code: TSHIRTSALE

name: The Original
description:
This is the original Vanilla T-shirt design, created nearly a decade ago. We started silk screening in our basement at home with our pals coming over to chip in on the screening, folding and ironing to set the ink. The inks were all hand mixed to get just the right flavor and relationship between the three colors that were being brought together on each garment. 

The current design and color schemes are the best of what came out of those good old days. 

Specs:


- Design by Jered Bogli (Vanilla’s OG designer).
- Printed just down the road on super soft, no-sweatshop American Apparel blanks. 

BUY TWO GET ONE FREE! - add three t-shirts of any design to your cart and enter promo code: TSHIRTSALE

name: Classic Script Tee
description:
Our script logo was designed by pal Jered Bogli (Vanillas OG graphic designer) and has graced the down tube and seat tube of our bikes for over ten years now.

Taken from our two favorite paint schemes: Evil Ryan's road racer and Sacha's cream SS cross racer from the site, the colors brought together for these two "Classic Script" shirts are quintessential, genuine, pure Vanilla.

 
Specs:

- Blanks are American Apparel and US made
- Printed here in southeast Portland.
- Available in Black with bright silver and sky blue script, or un-dyed organic cotton with brown and red graphics

BUY TWO GET ONE FREE! - add three t-shirts of any design to your cart and enter promo code: TSHIRTSALE

name: Vanilla Team Jersey - SS
description:
Whether you are ripped and fast as hell and want to fly the Vanilla Team colors, or you're simply a fan of Vanilla and keen to look good on the bike... no matter. If you are down, we're down with you.

Vintage Vanilla racing kit from 2005-2007 (slate blue) and 2008-2009 (Minty Fresh) and 2009-present (sky blue)

Stumptown Coffee roasters is not only a kindred company to Vanilla, but also a co-sponsor of the Vanilla Cyclocross team and is featured prominently on the shoulders and side panels of the jersey.

Note: We've got a handful of the original (pre-2008) slate blue jerseys as well!

 Specs:

- Made in the USA by Voler Team Apparel
- Light weight + highly breathable
- Full zip
- Race cut
- Design by Jered Bogli, DWP and Sacha White

Regular price $120
Current sale price $60

name: Women's Vanilla Team Short
description:
Vanilla Team Shorts for Women

What you see here is vintage Slate Blue Vanilla racing kit from 2005-2007 

Stumptown Coffee Roasters is not only a kindred company to Vanilla, but also a co-sponsor of the Vanilla Cyclocross team. Stumptown's black flag logo is featured prominently on the booty of our bib shorts.

Our shorts look best with matching jersey, but really they look good no matter what.

Specs:

- Made in the USA by Voler Team Apparel
- Full Lycra with Peloton cut
- Top of the line ION chamois

Regular price $120
Current sale price $60
